Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
colors \colors\ n. 1. a flag flown by a ship to show its nationality.
Syn: ensign, colours. [WordNet 1.5]
2. a distinguishing emblem; as, his tie proclaimed his school colors.
Syn: colours. [WordNet 1.5]
colors n 1: a flag that shows its nationality [syn: {colours}] 2: a distinguishing emblem; "his tie proclaimed his school colors" [syn: {colours}]
